Priest Siegfeld:
What are You talking about?
Tithing is a duty, a sacred duty to the people of the goddess, but we don't make to pay it. The villagers are free in their actions... it is Wonderful that they continue to do so in these difficult times. The goddess will be pleased with their devotion.
In any case, congratulations! You received the title "Hands of the Temple."
Before I give You the testimony that I will tell you that You need to know about his new role.
